medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal discomfort began 1 day before admission while in his USOH, worsening to severe pain by 3 PM after a meal. The patient experienced clenching pain in waves with a constant level of discomfort, peaking at severe levels. At 9 PM, he developed nausea and vomiting, initially with food and later with bright red blood. Symptoms persisted until he sought medical attention due to unbearable pain.
